item.description:
ğŸ“ Location: Greeley, CO, US ğŸ Work: On-site ğŸ’° Salary: USD 29 - 35 (hourly)
ğŸ“ Description: ***FAIRACRES IS CURRENTLY SEEKING A P.R.N. LPN TO JOIN OUR CLINICAL TEAM!***
